thread.title: Japan raids Coincheck offices after $530 mln heist

title: Japan raids Coincheck offices after $530 mln heist
text:
Japan raids Coincheck offices after $530 mln heist Friday, February 02, 2018 - 01:13 
Japan's financial regulator raided the offices of cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck and said it had asked them to fix flaws in their computer networks well before hackers stole $530 million of digital money last week. Ryan Brooks reports.   
Japan's financial regulator raided the offices of cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck and said it had asked them to fix flaws in their computer networks well before hackers stole $530 million of digital money last week. Ryan Brooks reports.  //reut.rs/2nBmqcV
